author: Fextralife
description:
Nioh 3 Demo Gameplay Impressions - OPEN WORLD Nioh??
Nioh 3 has officially been announced, and we got our hands on the PlayStation 5 demo to see what Team Ninja has in store for us! If you thought the brutal combat and deep RPG mechanics of the previous entries couldn’t get any better, think again. We break down the new gameplay mechanics, combat refinements, and world design, along with our first impressions of the demo. Does it live up to the hype?

https://nioh2.wiki.fextralife.com/Nioh+2+Wiki

0:00 Nioh 3 Demo Gameplay Impressions

1:19 Open World Gameplay
2:53 Nioh 3 Combat

8:59 Nioh 3 is Great so far
